description:
Keroro and the platoon become kites to get a fresh perspective on the invasion issue... but then just enjoy the experience. And Momoka sponsors a battledore tournament to gain Fuyuki`s affection, but Mois proves to be her equal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon, Love Transcends Space / Momoka vs Moa, Battle Clash
On vous envoie tout notre amour depuis le ciel / Bataille acharnée au badminton
ケロロ小隊 大空より愛をこめて であります / 桃華対モア 激突はねつきバトル であります
